iti50:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti50:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three unskillful roots.
iti50:2.4_0: These are the three unskillful roots. ”
iti50:3.3_0: For corruption that leads to your own deeds,
iti50:3.4_0: You have kept silent as fruit.”
iti50:4.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
iti50:4.2_0: First the first part of the body.
